//Generated by BehavEd

set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "SHOP1" );

affect ( "lou", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_LOOK_TARGET", "player" );

	task ( "step" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/shop3/cameraguard/01scanner.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "SHOP3_004" );
	}

	dowait ( "step" );

	affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/mullins/shop3/03drill.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "SHOP3_005" );
	}

	wait ( 1000.000 );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_LOOK_TARGET", "NULL" );
}
